name: Hotel Infinity
description:
You run a hotel—that infinite hotel that philosophers and mathematicians like to theorize about. Taking care of your guests is your top priority. Most of them are ghosts. ~5 min play time.

Controls: ⬆⬇➡⬅ to move/advance dialogue. ⬆⬇ to move between dialogue options; ➡ to select.

On mobile: swipe to move, tap to advance dialogue. Swipe up/down to move between dialogue options; right to select.

Made for Bitsy Jam #66: Ghosts on Holiday. Built in Bitsy, with help from Borksy and Pixsy.
